name: Dungeon Grinder (Devin Spikowski)
description:
• WASD/Arrows/HJKL to move
  • Space to wait

⚠️ My time was up before I could fix a fairly common crash, so here's a link to a newer version with less crashes: https://pixelatomy.com/dungeon-grinder/

Created by Devin Spikowski for 7DRL 2021

This is barely a game, but you can win and lose. This was my first game jam, first roguelike, and frankly my first "finished" game.

Thank you for checking it out!

I may add to it after the jam because I spent a lot of time on the engine.

Sprites from Kenney's 1-Bit Pack (most were modified)

Thank you to those who encouraged me, and to everyone who plays this!

My special gratitude to Fritzy for leading me to participate in this jam, which was my first ever game jam. Fritzy made an awesome library that I used for this game, and they're just an all-around helpful and kind person!

GitHub: https://github.com/vegeta897/7drl-2021

I wrote a long, self-critical post-mortem with pictures and links to live dev-builds: https://vegeta897.tumblr.com/post/645671397421613056/dungeon-grinder
